page.title: 20BEDLINGTON-It's a Canny Toon
page.content: When Willy the Bastard began his sawvey he left oot the North. We noo hope Bedlinton is noo on th' map and will staay there until Doomsday. I reckon w'iv covad everythin' excep' for the accent and humour. Steve King (MA pending), Bill Marley (BA), Ray Scott (B.Soc.and fell runna' extraordinaire), Dave Foster (MA and prize Nit), Rhona Dunn (Typin' fanatic), John Moore (BSC) abd their poopils have sweatid blud, had tuns o' fun and larnt a canny bit too. When ya readin' this remember us canny lads and lasses and get some ale doon ya clack. Ts tu: Laura, Sarah, Claire, Debbie, Jill, Lee, Eric, Ben. Jason, Alex, arah, Karen, Warren, Sharon, Louise, Lisa,Sam, Tina, Barbara, Julie and most History groups in Lower & Upper Fifth and all other help given. Dave, Steve and Bill
